snippet: Stocks closed lower after a jobless claims report provided little insight into the Federal Reserve’s decisions about stimulus policy.
abstract: Stock market slips, ending seven-day winning streak, as drop in precious metal prices drags mining shares lower.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed lower after a jobless claims report provided little insight into the Federal Reserve’s decisions about stimulus policy.

headline.main: Seven-Day Winning Streak for S.&P. Comes to an End
headline.print_headline: Seven-Day Winning Streak for S.&P. Comes to an End
